name: Lollyhop
description:
This is story of Polly 'l Hoppe, the lollypop that sure likes to hop.

She was set out to save the children from eating too many vegetables, however out of fear of harming the poor little things during the making of this game, all children were  canceled. The game now relies on some good old candy on vegetable violence.

Oh yeah and about the vegetables. Due to budget cuts, the game only includes one vegetable. Still makes a good soup though!

Hope you enjoy.

#######

This was the first game I ever made. I actually just started with game dev about 7 ays ago, so you know it's going to be good! ;-)

The audio really sucks. Sorry about that. I ran out of time to record something decent.

#######
